title: League client wont let me log in
body:
When i open the client it always says it's been restored to an old version and won't let me log in. :( i was in a game and i bugsplat but i cant get back in.

https://gyazo.com/01eae489d9d72d75c9b2756a4e2f6a12

https://gyazo.com/ca0246d553874e0396bcbadb87a74b25

Edit: i actually got leaver buster from this im beyond tilted
https://gyazo.com/2269d5e0664b0620a8c5bbc3fff00b8b

replies.body: Same here, any way of fixing it?

Typically those bugsplats mean that some hardware or software had a pretty bad interaction with the game. Most of the time those can be fixed by going through the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), but definitely hit me back up if that's not helping!
